posts.post_title: 1912 T202 Lot Of 2 Speaker Wood McGraw Bresnahan Both Graded

Nice 2 card lot-275.00 delivered. I am only selling as a lot right now. Hate to sell but as usual another deal has come up. Thanks for taking a look.

Joe
